result.eng: I would like to introduce myself to them.
result.ga: ba mhaith liom mé féin a chur in aithne dóibh
result.orig: ba mhaith liom mé féin a chur in aithne dóibh
result.html: ba mhaith liom mé féin a chur in aithne dóibhI would like to introduce myself to them.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁaiṫ liom mé féin a ċur in aiṫne dóiḃI would like to introduce myself to them.

result.eng: They threatened them with guns.
result.ga: bhagair siad le gunnaí iad
result.orig: bhagair siad le gunnaí iad
result.html: bhagair siad le gunnaí iadThey threatened them with guns.
result.ponchtml: ḃagair siad le gunnaí iadThey threatened them with guns.

result.eng: He would be failing himself if he abandoned them now.
result.ga: bheadh sé ag loiceadh air féin dá dtréigfeadh sé anois iad
result.orig: bheadh sé ag loiceadh air féin dá dtréigfeadh sé anois iad
result.html: bheadh sé ag loiceadh air féin dá dtréigfeadh sé anois iadHe would be failing himself if he abandoned them now.
result.ponchtml: ḃeaḋ sé ag loiceaḋ air féin dá dtréigfeaḋ sé anois iadHe would be failing himself if he abandoned them now.

result.eng: She gave them food an drink.
result.ga: thug sí bia agus deoch dóibh
result.orig: thug sí bia agus deoch dóibh
result.html: thug sí bia agus deoch dóibhShe gave them food an drink.
result.ponchtml: ṫug sí bia agus deoċ dóiḃShe gave them food an drink.

result.eng: He visited his children, all of them married by that time.
result.ga: chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sin
result.orig: chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sin

result.ponchtml: ċuir sé cuairt ar a ċlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sinHe visited his children, all of them married by that time.

result.eng: How long will it take them?
result.ga: cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthu
result.orig: cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthu
result.html: cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthuHow long will it take them?
result.ponchtml: cá ḟad a ṫógfaiḋ sé orṫuHow long will it take them?

result.eng: Our boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.
result.ga: d'ullmhaigh ár ndornálaithe go dian cé nach raibh traenálaí ar bith leo
result.orig: d'ullmhaigh ár ndornálaithe go dian cé nach raibh traenálaí ar bith leo

result.ponchtml: d'ullṁaiġ ár ndornálaiṫe go dian cé naċ raiḃ traenálaí ar biṫ leoOur boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.

result.eng: I paid them 20 euro.
result.ga: d'íoc mé 20 euro leo
result.orig: d'íoc mé 20 euro leo
result.html: d'íoc mé 20 euro leoI paid them 20 euro.
result.ponchtml: d'íoc mé 20 euro leoI paid them 20 euro.

result.eng: People can have dreams and achieve them.
result.ga: is féidir le daoine aisling a bheith acu agus í a bhaint amach
result.orig: is féidir le daoine aisling a bheith acu agus í a bhaint amach
result.html: is féidir le daoine aisling a bheith acu agus í a bhaint amachPeople can have dreams and achieve them.
result.ponchtml: is féidir le daoine aisling a ḃeiṫ acu agus í a ḃaint amaċPeople can have dreams and achieve them.

result.eng: We can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.
result.ga: is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí ann
result.orig: is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí ann

result.ponchtml: is léir ó na rianta a d'ḟág siad ina ndiaiḋ gur beirt a ḃí annWe can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.

result.eng: I am one of them.
result.ga: is mise duine acu
result.orig: is mise duine acu
result.html: is mise duine acuI am one of them.
result.ponchtml: is mise duine acuI am one of them.

result.eng: I can't see them.
result.ga: ní fheicim iad
result.orig: ní fheicim iad
result.html: ní fheicim iadI can't see them.
result.ponchtml: ní ḟeicim iadI can't see them.

result.eng: Doctors give them medicines which give them relief but do not cure them.
result.ga: tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iad
result.orig: tugann dochtúirí cógas dóibh a thugann faoiseamh dóibh ach nach leigheasann iad

result.eng: The two of them are at school.
result.ga: tá an bheirt acu ar scoil
result.orig: tá an bheirt acu ar scoil
result.html: tá an bheirt acu ar scoilThe two of them are at school.
result.ponchtml: tá an ḃeirt acu ar scoilThe two of them are at school.

result.eng: Look what is written on them.
result.ga: breathnaigh céard atá scríofa orthu
result.orig: breathnaigh céard atá scríofa orthu
result.html: breathnaigh céard atá scríofa orthuLook what is written on them.
result.ponchtml: breaṫnaiġ céard atá scríofa orṫuLook what is written on them.

result.eng: The ten of them are still alive, thank God.
result.ga: tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le dia
result.orig: tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le dia
result.html: tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le diaThe ten of them are still alive, thank God.
result.ponchtml: tá an deiċniúr acu fós beo buíoċas le diaThe ten of them are still alive, thank God.

result.eng: What about your parents? Do you get on well with them?
result.ga: cad é faoi do thuismitheoirí an réitíonn tú go maith leo siúd
result.orig: cad é faoi do thuismitheoirí an réitíonn tú go maith leo siúd
result.html: cad é faoi do thuismitheoirí an réitíonn tú go maith leo siúdWhat about your parents? Do you get on well with them?
result.ponchtml: cad é faoi do ṫuismiṫeoirí an réitíonn tú go maiṫ leo siúdWhat about your parents? Do you get on well with them?

result.eng: Do you see them every Friday?
result.ga: an bhfeiceann tú iad gach aoine
result.orig: an bhfeiceann tú iad gach aoine
result.html: an bhfeiceann tú iad gach aoineDo you see them every Friday?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfeiceann tú iad gaċ aoineDo you see them every Friday?

result.eng: Two of them are very big but the other one is very small.
result.ga: tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheag
result.orig: tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheag
result.html: tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheagTwo of them are very big but the other one is very small.
result.ponchtml: tá ḋá ċeann acu an-ṁór aċ tá an ceann eile an-ḃeagTwo of them are very big but the other one is very small.

result.eng: Hold them tight so they don't get away.
result.ga: coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidís
result.orig: coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidís
result.html: coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidísHold them tight so they don't get away.
result.ponchtml: coinniġ greim orṫu ar eagla go n-imeoidísHold them tight so they don't get away.

result.eng: They thanked God for saving them from the danger.
result.ga: ghabh siad buíochas le dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirt
result.orig: ghabh siad buíochas le dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirt
result.html: ghabh siad buíochas le dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirtThey thanked God for saving them from the danger.
result.ponchtml: ġaḃ siad buíoċas le dia as iad a ṫaḃairt slán as an gcontúirtThey thanked God for saving them from the danger.

result.eng: He disliked them immediately.
result.ga: ghlac sé col leo ar an toirt
result.orig: ghlac sé col leo ar an toirt
result.html: ghlac sé col leo ar an toirtHe disliked them immediately.
result.ponchtml: ġlac sé col leo ar an toirtHe disliked them immediately.

result.eng: Some people never stop laughing at them.
result.ga: tá siad de shíor ina gceap magaidh ag daoine áirithe
result.orig: tá siad de shíor ina gceap magaidh ag daoine áirithe
result.html: tá siad de shíor ina gceap magaidh ag daoine áiritheSome people never stop laughing at them.
result.ponchtml: tá siad de ẛíor ina gceap magaiḋ ag daoine áiriṫeSome people never stop laughing at them.

result.eng: There were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.
result.ga: bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leo
result.orig: bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leo
result.html: bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leoThere were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.
result.ponchtml: ḃí daoine ann ċuala mé ag béiceaḋ iad aċ ní raiḃ mé in ann taḋall leoThere were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.

result.eng: He had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ga: bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.orig: bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.html: bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé de ṁisneaċ aige t-léinte a ċaiṫeaṁ a ḃí ċoṁ teann sin go mbeaḋ eagla ort go bpollfaḋ a ḋidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.

result.eng: She nodded at them but they ignored her.
result.ga: sméid sí orthu ach rinne siad neamhaird di
result.orig: sméid sí orthu ach rinne siad neamhaird di
result.html: sméid sí orthu ach rinne siad neamhaird diShe nodded at them but they ignored her.
result.ponchtml: sméid sí orṫu aċ rinne siad neaṁaird diShe nodded at them but they ignored her.

result.eng: I must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ga: caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.orig: caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.html: caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ponchtml: caiṫfiḋ gur ḃuail mé leo uair nó ḋó ó d'iṫ muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.

result.eng: If I met them, though, I don't remember it.
result.ga: má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom é
result.orig: má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom é
result.html: má bhuail mé leo áfach ní cuimhin liom éIf I met them, though, I don't remember it.
result.ponchtml: má ḃuail mé leo áfaċ ní cuiṁin liom éIf I met them, though, I don't remember it.

result.eng: After they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.
result.ga: tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an príomh-aire leo
result.orig: tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an príomh-aire leo
result.html: tar éis dóibh filleadh abhaile bhuail an príomh-aire leoAfter they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.
result.ponchtml: tar éis dóiḃ filleaḋ aḃaile ḃuail an príoṁ-aire leoAfter they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.

result.eng: Both countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.
result.ga: tá trúpaí mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonn
result.orig: tá trúpaí mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonn

result.ponchtml: tá trúpaí ṁeiriceá sa dá ṫír sin fós deiċ mbliana anonnBoth countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.

result.eng: There are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.
result.ga: tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin seasaim leo araon
result.orig: tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin seasaim leo araon
result.html: tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin seasaim leo araonThere are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.
result.ponchtml: tá idir ḟíricí agus ḃreiṫiúnas sa ṁéid sin seasaim leo araonThere are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.

result.eng: Of course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ga: ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.orig: ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.html: ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ponchtml: ar ndóiġ ḃí cuid acu ċoṁ leaṁ le ḃeiṫ ag aṁarc ar ṁúscán gorm ag fás ar ṗíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.

result.eng: But from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ga: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.orig: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.html: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ponchtml: Ó am go ċéile áfaċ ḃíoḋ seoid ġrinn tuairimíoċta nó léirṁeas géarċúiseaċ le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.

result.eng: They were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ga: liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.orig: liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.html: liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ponchtml: liosta le háireaṁ a ḃí iontu tráṫ den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].

result.eng: But many of them look tired now.
result.ga: ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seo
result.orig: ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seo
result.html: ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seoBut many of them look tired now.
result.ponchtml: aċ tá cuma spíonta ar ċuid ṁór acu fán tráṫ seoBut many of them look tired now.

result.eng: You wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ga: ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.orig: ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.html: ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.

result.eng: If he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.
result.ga: má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iad
result.orig: má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iad
result.html: má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iadIf he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.
result.ponchtml: má tá teaċ mór agus culaiṫ ṁaiṫ éadaiġ aigesean altaíoḋ sé iadIf he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.

result.eng: There'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ga: ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.orig: ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.html: ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ponchtml: ní ḃeaḋ gar doṁsa nó duitse a ḃeiṫ ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.

result.eng: I would leave them alone if it wasn't for...
result.ga: ní bhainfinn dóibh murab é
result.orig: ní bhainfinn dóibh murab é
result.html: ní bhainfinn dóibh murab éI would leave them alone if it wasn't for...
result.ponchtml: ní ḃainfinn dóiḃ murab éI would leave them alone if it wasn't for...

result.eng: They would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
result.ga: is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraige
result.orig: is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraige
result.html: is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraigeThey would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
result.ponchtml: is minic a ẛuíoḋ siad ina mbeirt ar ḃruaċ na farraigeThey would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.

result.eng: The sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.
result.ga: d'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibh
result.orig: d'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibh
result.html: d'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibhThe sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.
result.ponchtml: d'éiriġ an ġrian agus noċt na caisleáin óir fá ġiota dóiḃThe sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.

result.eng: In the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ga: sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.orig: sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.html: sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ponchtml: sa ġeiṁreaḋ ba ġnáċ leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a ḋéanaṁ sna sruṫáinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.

result.eng: He put them upside down in the middle of the floor.
result.ga: bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iad
result.orig: bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iad
result.html: bhuail sé a mbéal fúthu i lár an urláir iadHe put them upside down in the middle of the floor.
result.ponchtml: ḃuail sé a mbéal fúṫu i lár an urláir iadHe put them upside down in the middle of the floor.

result.eng: Before them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ga: baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.orig: baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.html: baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ponchtml: baile beag suaraċ ocraċ beadaí a ḃí amaċ rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.

result.eng: Life was getting hard for them.
result.ga: bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthu
result.orig: bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthu
result.html: bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthuLife was getting hard for them.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an saol ag cur cruaiḋ orṫuLife was getting hard for them.

result.eng: There was no point in him opposing them.
result.ga: ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadan
result.orig: ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadan
result.html: ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadanThere was no point in him opposing them.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ gar leis cur ina n-éadanThere was no point in him opposing them.

result.eng: Make sure to grab them by the throat and strangle them.
result.ga: bí siúráilte greim sceadamáin a bhreith orthu agus a dtachtadh
result.orig: bí siúráilte greim sceadamáin a bhreith orthu agus a dtachtadh
result.html: bí siúráilte greim sceadamáin a bhreith orthu agus a dtachtadhMake sure to grab them by the throat and strangle them.
result.ponchtml: bí siúráilte greim sceadamáin a ḃreiṫ orṫu agus a dtaċtaḋMake sure to grab them by the throat and strangle them.

result.eng: It was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ga: ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.orig: ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.html: ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ponchtml: ba doilig ḃeiṫ ina gcuideaċta gan a ḃeiṫ mar ḋuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.

result.eng: That was the last I saw of them.
result.ga: ba é sin an t-amharc deireanach a fuair mé orthu
result.orig: ba é sin an t-amharc deireanach a fuair mé orthu
result.html: ba é sin an t-amharc deireanach a fuair mé orthuThat was the last I saw of them.
result.ponchtml: ba é sin an t-aṁarc deireanaċ a fuair mé orṫuThat was the last I saw of them.

result.eng: He felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
result.ga: bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí inti
result.orig: bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí inti
result.html: bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí intiHe felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
result.ponchtml: ḃí truaiġ aige dóiḃ aċ truaiġ gan tarrṫáil a ḃí intiHe felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
